description.value:
You gain proficiency in three two handed weapons of your choice.

Once per turn, when you make an attack with a melee weapon you are holding with two hands, you can apply the &Reference[Vex] Weapon Mastery property for that attack in place of the weapon's normal Weapon Mastery property.

Foundry Note

Upon selecting this feat, you will have to manually grant yourself proficiency with the selected weapons on your character sheet. It is recommended taht you edit this feat with the weapons you selected for your own reference.
